feed.title: Dokploy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.20.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(cluster-nodes): enhance node management by adding serverId prop … by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1506
  • feat(application): add cleanCache feature to application management by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1508

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.20.3...v0.20.4

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.20.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(ui): Prevent Zero from Persisting in Numeric Input by @ensarkurrt in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1513
  • 338 how to restore a database backup by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1514
  • Fix: Consistent Component Styling and Server URL by @Alm0stEthical in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1510
  • fix(api): enhance GitHub deployment handling with additional GitHub … by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1516

New Contributors

  • @ensarkurrt made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1513
  • @Alm0stEthical made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.20.4...v0.20.5

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.20.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: move buttons to allow deploy, rebuild etc in mongodb by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1526
  • 1524 getting 502 bad gateway by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1528
  • feat(backup): enhance RestoreBackup component and API to include serv… by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1530

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.20.5...v0.20.6

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.20.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix/loader swarm by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1531
  • fix(ui): Improve Numeric Input Handling in Swarm Cluster Settings, Traefik Port Mappings, and Email Notifications by @ensarkurrt in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1522
  • fix(server-setup): resolve Alpine Linux compatibility issues by @nb5p in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1507

New Contributors

  • @nb5p made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1507

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.20.6...v0.20.7
